column3: A family's stay at a remote hotel becomes terrifying as the father descends into madness.
A secretary on the run stops at a mysterious motel.
A mother seeks help from priests when her daughter is possessed by a malevolent spirit.
Teenagers are haunted by Freddy Krueger in their dreams.
Michael Myers escapes from a mental institution and returns to his hometown to kill.
Paranormal investigators help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
A family's dark secrets unravel after the death of their secretive grandmother.
A mother and son are haunted by a sinister presence from a children's book.
A curse is passed through sexual contact with relentless pursuers.
A child psychologist helps a young boy who claims to see dead people.
An FBI trainee consults a brilliant but insane serial killer to catch another killer.
A pregnant woman suspects her neighbors have sinister plans for her unborn child.
A black man visits his white girlfriend's family only to uncover disturbing secrets.
A true-crime writer uncovers unsettling home movies in his new house.
Watching a cursed videotape leads to a terrifying curse.
Three thieves break into a blind man's house but he's not as helpless as he seems.
A Puritan family faces supernatural evil in the woods.
A woman believes her house is haunted by malevolent spirits.
Explorers encounter deadly creatures in an uncharted cave system.
A couple is haunted by a malevolent entity in their home.
A group of friends encounters a family of cannibals in Texas.
A diplomat's son may be the Antichrist.
Student filmmakers get lost in a haunted forest.
People awaken to find themselves in deadly traps set by a sadistic killer.
A family's home is invaded by malevolent spirits.
A family seeks to protect their comatose son from malevolent spirits.
A curse afflicts anyone who enters a house where a murder occurred.
A young woman is cursed by a sinister old woman.
A woman returns to her childhood home to open an orphanage but uncovers dark secrets.
A man wakes up in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombie-like creatures.
Five friends on a trip become victims of a mysterious organization's deadly games.
